RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 1 5F Dirt CR: 59. Maiden Special Weight Purse 34000. FOR ACCREDITED LA BRED MAIDENS, TWO YEARS OLD. Weight, 118 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: DEAL WITH IT DADDY in the second flight while between horses, moved closer in the three path late in the turn, saw his progress stall on the winner upper stretch, roused, late surge to win going away at the end. SOUNDS LIKE POWER broke sharp, dueled up front into the turn closest to the inside, disposed of the other speed by late in the bend to shake free, edged away from the runner up in upper stretch then failed to contain that one in the late going. EL DINERO in the second group outside the winner, moved closer with that one late in the turn, lacked a further advance, finished well clear of the others. POP'S PEPPYSTEPER also raced in the second flight for three furlongs, crept a bit closer along the inside late in the bend then came up empty for the stretch run. BABY'S LAST DANCE fell back to trail after the start, did not menace. POUND OUT A DEAL broke alertly, dueled outside the runner up for three furlongs and stopped late turn.

ENTRY.NAME: Baby's Last Dance
ENTRY.COMMENT: fell back to trail, did not menace

ENTRY.NAME: Pop's Peppysteper
ENTRY.COMMENT: back off the pace inside, empty drive

ENTRY.NAME: Deal With It Daddy
ENTRY.COMMENT: 2nd flight btwn foes, closer 3w 1/4, stalled, late surge

ENTRY.NAME: El Dinero
ENTRY.COMMENT: 2nd group outside, closer 4w late turn, evenly drive, best rest

ENTRY.NAME: Sounds Like Power
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke sharp, dueled closest to rail, shook free, caught

ENTRY.NAME: Pound Out a Deal
ENTRY.OWNER: Bruno Jr Gerald Deville Carl J and Our Blue Streaks Stable
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke alertly, dueled off rail, stopped late turn

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 2 5F Turf CR: 101. Allowance Optional Claiming Purse 33000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES OR WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES SINCE JANUARY 17, 2023 OR CLAIMING PRICE $30,000. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since May 17, 2023 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Pr ice $30,000 (Claiming Races Not Considered In Allowances). (Rail at 20 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MY PAL MATTIE broke on top, set all the pace, drew off under his own courage in a sharp effort. DANCIN WITH ANGELS back off the pace inside, moved closest to the winner turning for home, chased that one in vain past the furlong marker, no match, proved determined for the place. SEAU headed up the second flight up the backstretch between horses, long drive for the place, outkicked late by the runner up. SCRAPPY ARTIE never menaced while racing outside.

ENTRY.NAME: My Pal Mattie
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke on top, all the pace, drew off, ridden out

ENTRY.NAME: Seau
ENTRY.COMMENT: 2nd flight early btwn, long drive 2nd, outkicked

ENTRY.NAME: Dancin With Angels
ENTRY.COMMENT: back off pace, closer late turn, determined 2nd

ENTRY.NAME: Scrappy Artie
ENTRY.COMMENT: never menaced while racing outside

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 3 7F Dirt CR: 59. Claiming Purse 13000. FOR ACCREDITED LA BRED FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: BITSY C C LIL GIRL outrun early while firmly in hand, continued under restraint into the turn, advanced into a striking position while three wide into the lane, took over when straightened for home, clear late when drifting in, continued to hold sway. MARDI GRAS ALARM dueled up front off the inside, garnered a larger advantage late in the turn, offered some resistance to the winner in upper stretch inside that one then could not keep up, steadied late, second best. THE GREY BEAUTY chased the dueling leaders up the backstretch off the inside, came four wide for the drive, idled past the furlong marker, came back to earn the show while not a serious late threat to the top two. BOSTON LUCILLE last to leave, void of early foot, ranged up to become a minor threat five wide turning for home, flattened out the final furlong to lose the show. RESPOSADO dueled up front inside the runner up, gave ay turning for home. LIGHT AS A WHISPER settled off the pace, backed up through the stretch.

ENTRY.NAME: Bitsy C C Lil Girl
ENTRY.COMMENT: outrun early firmly in hand, closer, 3w bid into lane,clear,drift

ENTRY.NAME: Resposado
ENTRY.OWNER: Elite Thoroughbred Racing LLC and Menard David
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled inside, gave way into stretch

ENTRY.NAME: Boston Lucille
ENTRY.COMMENT: last away, fanned 5w into lane, mild advance, flattened

ENTRY.NAME: Light as a Whisper
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled off the pace, backed up stretch

ENTRY.NAME: Mardi Gras Alarm
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled up front, larger lead late turn,outkicked, std'd late

ENTRY.NAME: The Grey Beauty
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased duel, 4w intok lane, came back show

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 4 6F Dirt CR: 68. Claiming Purse 11000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: COURAGEOUS TIMMY off a step slow, raced well back up the backstretch and into the turn, angled out widest for the drive, finished full of run down the middle of the strip to be edging clear at the wire. LONG ARROW in the second flight inside, asked for run midway on the turn, roused along the rail entering the stretch, tipped out a bit for some run, challenged with a sixteenth to run between foes, could not contain the winner late. FUNNY ACTOR in the second group outside the runner up, came three wide for the drive, lodged a mild bid in late stretch, not enough for the top two late. VEGAS GUY dueled up front closest to the inside, shook clear upper, weakened. ROYAL UNLIMITED alternated up front in the two path, gave way. WAR REPORTER fell back to trail by a wide margin after the start, continued sluggishly into the turn, eased, vanned off.

ENTRY.NAME: Long Arrow
ENTRY.COMMENT: 2nd flight inside, asked turn, tipped out, bid btwn, 2nd best

ENTRY.NAME: Vegas Guy
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled up front inside, shook clear upper, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Courageous Timmy
ENTRY.COMMENT: off step slow, well back, angled out, full of run midtrack

ENTRY.NAME: War Reporter
ENTRY.COMMENT: fell back to trail, sluggish, eased, vanned off

ENTRY.NAME: Funny Actor
ENTRY.COMMENT: 2nd flight 2p, three wide drive, outside bid, not enuf

ENTRY.NAME: Royal Unlimited
ENTRY.COMMENT: alternated up front two path, gave way

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 5 1M Turf CR: 84. Claiming Purse 16000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since May 17, 2023 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $12,500, if for $10,000, allowed 2 lbs. (Rail at 20 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SEEHOSS forwardly placed past the wire the first time, tucked in to save some ground into the first turn, tracked up the backstretch, in some traffic when inching closer midway on the final turn, split foes under clever handling upper straight, gained command, repelled the winner late under steady handling. BONUS APPRECIATION in mid pack while racing outside, came four wide out of the final turn, challenged outside the winner inside the furlong grounds, turned back, held sway for the place. BATTLE OF WILL fell back after the start, continued to lack speed the middle half mile, five wide turning into the stretch, staged a mild rally to garner the show. VALIANT DEFENDER last to leave, trailed while devoid of any early foot, advanced quickly late in the final turn, angled out for room entering the stretch, traffic with a sixteenth to run, finished up evenly when clear. BARAHIN broke on top, chased early, soft duel in the two path the middle half, weakened in the final furlong. YOUR TIME'S COMING settled off the pace, steadied in some traffic toward the rail with three furlongs to run, came up empty when clear for the drive. XIETELEHUAS remained back in failing to menace. BRYKEN N MITCHELL took command to be clear early, dueled the middle four furlongs through some modest fractions along the inside, gave way upper stretch. TIN DELAY four wide when forwardly placed through the first turn, remained prominent in the run up the backstretch, weakened in the second bend.

ENTRY.NAME: Bryken N Mitchell
ENTRY.COMMENT: took command early, clear, dueled, faltered inside

ENTRY.NAME: Barahin
ENTRY.COMMENT: soft duel 2p, weakened late

ENTRY.NAME: Seehoss
ENTRY.COMMENT: forward, tucked inside, split foes upper, repelled foe late

ENTRY.NAME: Battle of Will
ENTRY.COMMENT: fell back, lacked speed, 5w turning for home, mild bid 3rd

ENTRY.NAME: Valiant Defender
ENTRY.COMMENT: last away, trailed, advanced late 2nd, steered out,traffic 1/16

ENTRY.NAME: Bonus Appreciation
ENTRY.COMMENT: mid pack outside, 4w into lane, late bid, turned back

ENTRY.NAME: Your Time's Coming
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled off the pace, traffic, steadied 3/8, empty

ENTRY.NAME: Tin Delay
ENTRY.COMMENT: forwardly placed 4w 1st turn, weakened 2nd

ENTRY.NAME: Xietelehuas
ENTRY.COMMENT: remained back in failing to menace

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 6 5F Dirt CR: 45. Maiden Claiming Purse 12000. FOR ACCREDITED LA BRED MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MARINA broke in to bump and bother inner rivals, angled toward the inside, dueled into and through early turn, steadily kicked away while being kept to task through the lane. AMELIES DREAMER broke forwardly, dueled up front outside the winner, failed to keep up with that one from late in the turn on in, fully extended to save the place. SUNSET FLASH broke back, and was bothered soon after, void of speed, was five wide out of the turn, staged a willingly rally down the middle of the start to be rapidly getting to the runner up. PERIPHERAL VISION in mid pack while inside, continued to save ground turn, displayed some modest late interest to improve position. SILK NOT SATIN bumped at the start, raced back and well out in the strip, four wide exiting the turn, lacked a serious closing response. A. P. STYLE bumped and bothered by the winner at the break, recovered to race closest to the dueling top two for three furlongs and began to weaken. CAN SHE VENT in the second fight early, brushed in some traffic turning for home, faded. ELLA'S BABY in the second group, was idling in traffic when forced to check up in tight turning for home, backed up in the run to the wire. TIZ A BREAKUP remained always back in failing to menace. LUCILLE'S CANDY wheeled at the start, vanned off. FOLLOWING A STEWARDS' INQUIRY REGARDING THE START AND THE RUN OUT OF THE TURN, NO ACTION WAS TAKEN.

ENTRY.NAME: Tiz a Breakup
ENTRY.COMMENT: remained always back in failing to menace

ENTRY.NAME: Peripheral Vision
ENTRY.COMMENT: mid pack inside, mild late interest

ENTRY.NAME: Ella's Baby
ENTRY.COMMENT: 2nd group, tight, checked up 1/14, backed up

ENTRY.NAME: Can She Vent
ENTRY.COMMENT: 2nd flight, traffic, brush late turn, faded

ENTRY.NAME: Lucille's Candy
ENTRY.COMMENT: wheeled start, vanned off

ENTRY.NAME: Sunset Flash
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke back, slight bother, lacked speed, 5w rally, gaining 2nd

ENTRY.NAME: Silk Not Satin
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped break, mid pack, 4w into lane, lacked serious bid

ENTRY.NAME: A. P. Style
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped, bothered brk, recovered to race forward, little left

ENTRY.NAME: Marina
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke in, bump, angled in, dueled rail, kicked clear stretch

ENTRY.NAME: Amelies Dreamer
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke fowardly, dueled outside, no match, saved 2nd

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 7 1M Turf CR: 96. Allowance Optional Claiming Purse 32000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES OR CLAIMING PRICE $15,000. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since May 17, 2023 Allowed 3 lbs. Such A Race Since April 17 Allowed 5 lbs. Claim ing Price $15,000 (Claiming Races For $12,500 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances). (Rail at 20 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: INTIMIDATION broke forwardly, allowed the pace to go while saving ground, moved closer in some traffic into the far turn, moved out three wide for room when straightened for home, outside bid past the furlong marker, drew clear under firm handling. MINNESOTA MIRACLE broke with the lead despite bobbling, dueled up front in the two path, allowed a rival the rail after a half, helped pick up the pace in the far turn, vied between foes into the lane, extended drive, proved stubborn to the end, game for the place. WHEN'S TEE TIME in mid pack while off the inside, roused in the second fight outside the winner late in the final turn, three wide for the drive, stalled a bit in midstretch then managed a late push to be getting to the runner up. SNIVELING forwardly placed early along the inside, moved up the rail to challenge just before a half, vied along the rail through the final turn, remained on equal terms with the top two with a furlong to run then weakened late. CHAOSMOS raced in mid pack off the pace, came three wide for the drive, improved slightly without posing a serious threat late. U S NAVY CROSS void of speed, four wide exiting the final turn, picked off a couple of tiring rivals after the issue had been decided. JUST DEAL WITH IT last away, was never a serious threat. G VICTORY dueled outside the runner up in the three path first turn and onto the backstretch, continued to contest the issue three wide second bend, gave way. GUITAR TRIBUTE was finished after a half.

ENTRY.NAME: Intimidation
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked inside,closer rail,moved 3w, outside bid, clear

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: G. Watts Humphrey Jr. & St. George Farm, LLC

ENTRY.NAME: Chaosmos
ENTRY.COMMENT: back off the pace, 3w into lane, improved slightly

ENTRY.NAME: Guitar Tribute
ENTRY.COMMENT: finished after a half

ENTRY.NAME: When's Tee Time
ENTRY.COMMENT: mid pack, roused 2nd turn in 2nd flight, gaining 2nd

ENTRY.NAME: Sniveling
ENTRY.COMMENT: forward and inside, early move rail, vied, weakened late

ENTRY.NAME: Minnesota Miracle
ENTRY.COMMENT: bobble brk, dueled off rail, vied btwn, stubbornly

ENTRY.NAME: G Victory
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled up front 3w, gave way drive

ENTRY.NAME: Just Deal With It
ENTRY.COMMENT: last away, never a serious threat

ENTRY.NAME: U S Navy Cross
ENTRY.COMMENT: void of speed, 4w into lane, passed tiring foes

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 8 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 75. Allowance Purse 35000. FOR ACCREDITED LA BRED FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON A RACE OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, OR STARTER OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since May 17, 2023 Allowed 3 lbs. A Race Since April 17, 2023 Allowed 5 lbs. (Claiming Races Not Considered In Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: BLESSED ASSURANCE fell back after the break, continued back and well out in the strip into the turn, made a nice move four wide into contention late in the bend, took over when straightened for home, kicked steadily clear under firm handling. CAJUN CATALINA with the pace from the start, vied three wide into and through the turn, proved no match for the winner in chasing that one home, held the place. SHESABEAUTYDANCER with the pace from along the inside despite stumbling at the break, held a narrow advantage into the lane, also had little for the winner to the wire, outkicked for the runner up position. BANDIT'S PRIDE fell back to trail after the start, four to five wide exiting the turn, improved position. DOLLY'S GUITAR settled in mid pack, lacked a closing response. MY KIKI in the second flight early, began a steady fade before three furlongs. BUILDING HOME vied up front while between horses, gave way.

ENTRY.NAME: Bandit's Pride
ENTRY.COMMENT: fell back to trail, 4-5w into lane,improved

ENTRY.NAME: Dolly's Guitar
ENTRY.COMMENT: last away, mid pack, lacked closing kick

ENTRY.NAME: Shesabeautydancer
ENTRY.OWNER: Deckert Mark and Terre Dawn W
ENTRY.COMMENT: stumbled start, recovered to vie inside, outkicked for 2nd

ENTRY.NAME: Building Home
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied between horses, gave way

ENTRY.NAME: Blessed Assurance
ENTRY.COMMENT: fell back after start, nice move 4w late turn, kicked well clear

ENTRY.NAME: Cajun Catalina
ENTRY.COMMENT: with the pace, vied 3w turn, no match, held 2nd

ENTRY.NAME: My Kiki
ENTRY.COMMENT: 2nd flight early, faded

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 9 5F Turf CR: 73. Maiden Claiming Purse 18000. FOR MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $20,000, For Each $2,500 To $15,000 2 lbs. (Rail at 20 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: BUCK DOLL TAYLOR fractious prior to the start, broke well, relinquished the lead soon after, pressed into the turn, took over turning for home, edged away late under steady handling. TRIPLE RED ACES moved up the inside to set the early pace after not breaking with the early leaders, continued to show the way turn, headed into the lane by the winner, gave ground grudgingly to that one until late, lasted for the place. SUNNY SASSICAIA back off the early pace, worked way toward the rail turn, roused in the two path exiting the bend, slowly gaining for the place late. ARKANSAS ZONG within striking distance outside, four wide turn, went evenly through the stretch in lacking a closing response. STEAUXLIT off slowly, lacked speed for three furlongs, picked off a few tiring rivals while not posing a serious threat. WICKED TOUGH in the second flight early, had little for the drive. FIGHTING SOLDIER mid pack early, began a steady retreat before three furlongs. TEXAS PHAROAH off a step slow, trailed well back, distanced after losing contact with the field, jogged in.

ENTRY.NAME: Triple Red Aces
ENTRY.COMMENT: moved up inside to set pace, stubborn til late, saved 2nd

ENTRY.NAME: Fighting Soldier
ENTRY.COMMENT: staged a steady retreat

ENTRY.NAME: Steauxlit
ENTRY.COMMENT: off slowly, back, passed tiring foes 3w

ENTRY.NAME: Buck Doll Taylor
ENTRY.OWNER: Autumn Hill Farms Racing Stables, Inc.
ENTRY.COMMENT: fractious prestart, pressed 2p, took over, drew away late

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Autumn Hill Farms Racing Stables, Inc.

ENTRY.NAME: Texas Pharoah
ENTRY.COMMENT: off step slow, well back, distanced, jogged in

ENTRY.NAME: Wicked Tough
ENTRY.COMMENT: 2nd flight, had little for the drive

ENTRY.NAME: Arkansas Zong
ENTRY.COMMENT: within striking distance outside, 4w turn, evenly drive

ENTRY.NAME: Sunny Sassicaia
ENTRY.COMMENT: back off the early pace, roused 2p, slowly gaining 2nd
